article: 45 Sweet Paragraphs That’ll Make Your Girlfriend Cry
intro: Are you looking for some beautiful words that’ll have your girlfriend tearing up? We’ve got you covered! You may have lots of feelings and thoughts you want to convey, but writing them down in one succinct paragraph can be challenging. Don’t worry because we’ve come up with a bunch of sample paragraphs you can tweak to your liking and send to your special someone. Just remember to write from your heart. As long as you’re sincere, it probably won’t take much to have your girlfriend tearing up when she reads about how much you love and cherish her.
